caption.p: Median quantification of renal damage in four dengue fatal cases ( n = 4) compared to control cases ( n = 4). ( A) Vascular congestion in renal cortical regions ( p = 0.0040). ( B) Tubular degeneration ( p ≤ 0.0001). ( C) Renal cortical infiltrates ( p ≤ 0.0001). ( D) Vascular congestion in renal medullary regions ( p = 0.1280). ( E) Tubular necrosis ( p = 0.0008). ( F) Infiltrates in renal medullary regions ( p ≤ 0.0001).
